Package callofproject.dev.project.service

Class ProjectOwnerService

java.lang.Object
callofproject.dev.project.service.ProjectOwnerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectOwnerService
@Service @Lazy public class ProjectOwnerService extends Object implements IProjectOwnerService
Service class for project owner-related operations. It implements the IProjectOwnerService interface.
